pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a modern subway station platform. The camera is tilted at a dramatic angle, looking down the long, empty platform toward the darkness of a tunnel. The station is illuminated by sleek blue and yellow lights, and a digital sign displays the time, platform number, and public health information in German.
